main event: A civilian observed a large fluorescent light in the sky over Taftville, Connecticut, for approximately 10 minutes on August 17, 1967.
interesting points: The object was stationary and occasionally moved slowly,The observer described the object as having a dull side with what looked like two windows separated yet close to each other,The object emitted no noise and suddenly disappeared when the lights went out,The observer's wife and mother had previously seen a similar object,The report was not re-evaluated by the Air Force due to it not being filed within 30 days.
witness description: The observer is an 8th-grade student, and his wife and mother also witnessed the object.
